alert.note: Alert for Haskell; McIntosh; Muskogee; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:55AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Haskell, northeastern McIntosh, northwestern Sequoyah and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 155 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Keefeton to near Warner to 7 miles northwest of Porum. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Warner... Vian... Gore... Porum... Webbers Falls... Greenleaf State Park... Lake Tenkiller State Park... Keefeton... Box... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 271 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
